fields.description:
When using {{<property name="run-on-main-thread" type="bool">true</property>}} and try to add an annotation to the map, no error is shown, but the annotation won't be added to the map. This does not happen with main thread disabled. 

I just noticed the issue in one of my projects and will need to isolate the Ti.Map related code next.
fields.summary: Ti.Map: iOS - Annotations not added to the map when running on main thread
